    • Uses of IInputManager in sage.app

      Methods in sage.app that return IInputManager 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IInputManager BaseGame.getInputManager()
      Returns the IInputManager used by BaseGame.
      Methods in sage.app with parameters of type IInputManager 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void BaseGame.setInputManager(IInputManager inputManager)
      Sets the IInputManager used by BaseGame to be the specified IInputManager.

    • Uses of IInputManager in sage.input

      Classes in sage.input that implement IInputManager 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  InputManager
      This class implements the IInputManager interface and acts as the central management point for all input devices available for controlling a game.
      Constructors in sage.input with parameters of type IInputManager 
      Constructor and Description
      ThirdPersonCameraController(ICamera cam, SceneNode target, IInputManager inputMgr, java.lang.String inputControllerName)
      Constructs a ThirdPersonCameraController that allows orbiting the specified camera around the specified target SceneNode using the controls provided by the specified IInputManager and input controller.
